pullRequest.title: [BC-160] Create sync acceptance test
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
This PR adds an in-progress (and currently disabled) acceptance test for syncing which doesn't yet work.  The nodes are unable to connect at the moment:

java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: io.libp2p.core.Libp2pException: Missing IP4/IP6/DNSADDR in multiaddress /dns4/artemisnode1/tcp/9000/p2p/16Uiu2HAmS2HdAfedzgjmXuiyt29UGSpNQdPpBufCQrxFGxoJcgiK

Upgrading our jvm-libp2p dependency to 0.3.1 should fix the connectivity issues.  We also need to work on the timing for this test.  Waiting for finalized blocks means this test takes a lot of time to run.

commit.message: (In progress) Start working on sync test

nodes.bodyText: These log statements are a good idea - we should put them in the DSL (ie ArtemisNode.start() should automatically print a debug log).  The messages would be slightly less nice (each node has a unique name but it's not as nice a "first node") but it would make the tests simpler and give better progress indicators for all tests.
